Blog Logo




I'm Celestine Omin. I build for the web ... mobile someday.

I'm a Software Engineer, currently working at Konga, an $80M VC backed eCommerce company.

I speak at conferences and I am also a trainer.

I am the maintainer of NSEFinance, an official API for the Nigerian Stock Exchange.

You can reach me via email

You can find out more about me from my LinedIn profile
